Question
========

A company *A* owns three factories, namely *A*~1~, *A*~2~ and *A*~3~, TRUE where razors of the same type are made. During a given period, factory *A*~1~ made 2000 shavers, of which 200 were defective, factory *A*~2~ made 5000 devices during that period, of which 300 were defective, and *A*~3~ made 3000 devices, including 150 defective ones. Together they made 10,000 appliances during this period. A inspector randomly chooses a shaver from the total production. How high is the probability that this device is defective (*D*)?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,015
* 0,02
* 0,03
* 0,065

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.015: Incorrect
* 0.02: Incorrect
* 0.03: Incorrect
* 0.065: Correct
